experiences.title: UltraAVX
experiences.description: An immersive cinematic experience. Reserved seating. A giant screen. Dolby digital surround sound. Wider, high-back rocker chair. Don’t just watch the movie, LIVE the movie!

experiences.title: D-BOX
experiences.description: Enjoy a seat that moves in concert with the action on-screen. Reserve your large, comfortable seat that vibrates, moves up and down as well as forward and backwards. You’ll see and feel the movie.

experiences.title: RealD3D
experiences.description: Crisp, bright, ultra-realistic 100% digital three dimensional images come alive on-screen.

theatreMessages.body: Starting April 17, SCENE is updating the number of points you earn and redeem on your movie tickets. Learn more at scene.ca/updates

Remember, printing a paper ticket is no longer required. Scan your eTickets from your phone with the ticket taker. To avoid data charges, you can download your eTickets to your device before heading to the theatre.
